pp2016.team19.shared

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • pp2016.team19.shared.Character
      • pp2016.team19.shared.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends Character
implements java.io.Serializable

    Player Class extending Character class and providing name, password, whether he is logged in, whether he has the key, number of potions he carries, the effect of a potion, the score, whether he's invulnerable and a path to a defined position.

    Class Player contains all data about a player and offers methods to move the character to a defined position or to interact (attack / use potion).
    Author:
    Strohbuecker, Max, 5960738
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • moveToPos

        public java.util.LinkedList<Node> moveToPos(int xGoal,
                                            int yGoal)
        Calculates a path to a specific position with AStarSearch. Additionally adds the goal position to this path, because AStarSeach only calculates until one field before the goal (easier for the monster system).
        Parameters:
        xGoal - x-coordinate of the goal position
        yGoal - y-coordinate of the goal position
        Returns:
        returns null if no path was found, otherwise returns the path to the goal as list of nodes

      • monsterToAttack

        Returns:
        returns an attackable monster
